resources.string: Analysis completed successful. Creating the study plan…
Error when try to generate the study plan. You need to try again?
Congratulation, the study plan was created successfully!\n\nYou can edit or generate another plan when you want.
Select your favorite time to study

Here you should inform your time availability for each period of the day in a weekly calendar.

To make your life easier, we provide some pre-registered user profiles. When selecting one of them, the availability calendar is already filled in according to the selected profile.

For example, when clicking on the Worker profile, the calendar is already filled as availability to study, only in the evening between Monday and Friday.
\u0020- I\'m availlable. We will try to fill all your available time. Press CONTINUE when you finish.
In this screen it is possible to edit the availability level in each period.\n\nRemember that the colors represent:\u0020
\u0020- I have low availability. We will try to fill the periods with courses, but without fill all the time.\n
\u0020- I have no availability. We will try to put no courses within this period.\n

What is your favorite period of the day to study?\n\nDo you like to study in the morning? in the Afternoon? at night? all of them?. This information will be important and we will try not to put very difficult courses in periods that you have a high difficult to learning.

Here you can personalize your study plan.

To edit a subject or a hour, touch them and then in the Edit icon.

To remove, select the subject and then touch the Remove icon showed in the upper menu.

Following the recommendation of cognitive and learning area, we will schedule for you maximum 5 study hours for each period of the day.

Remember that the sum of the period times does not more than 5 hours! But relax, we will do the sum for you. :)

To save what you edited, just return to the backward screen.

Nice, you are in your Study Plan now. :)

Fell free to edit with your preferences. To do this, touch the Edit icon in the upper menu.

With you want another Study Plan schedule suggest click on the menu and then select "Suggest another plan". But remember, with you select this option you will lose your actual plan.

We will remind you what courses you need to study. For example, if you have 2 courses to study in the night, we will remind you in the afternoon. You can disable this notification in the App configuration option.

Here, you need to put your courses that you will study. Remember to put for each courses the importance degree and the difficult level.

To register a new course click in the '+' button localized in the upper menu.

When you finish all courses register, follow up touching in the CONTINUE button
Select a period of the day
For the person that like to plan all available time
Available to study from monday to friday morning and night
Available to study from monday to friday afternoon and night
Available to study from monday to friday morning and afternoon
Available to study from monday to friday at night
Available to study in the weekend
Send your feedback, suggestion and doubt
Do you want to receive alerts to remember you to study?
Do you like the app? Give us your review in the Play store
The best App to organize your study! Check it out at https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=br.com.smartstudyplan
The best App to organize your study! Check it out at https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=br.com.smartstudyplan
It is necessary to put a course name
Analyzing your favorite time to study…

The App aims to generate a study plan automatically scheduling the courses that the student need to study in a weekly calendar. .

For this, the system uses Artificial intelligence and concepts from the specialists of the learn and cognition area. The app also alert the user what he needs to study, helping students to manage and organize their studies. 

This app win the INOVApps contest, promoted by Brasilian Federal Governament.
